data.prayer: Spirit, train the church of Rumphi, Malawi to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Rumphi, Malawi

data.prayer: Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the state of Rumphi, Malawi who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Rumphi, Malawi.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.prayer: Lord, help the people of Rumphi, Malawi to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.

Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Gujarati people.
Spirit, guide seekers in Rumphi, Malawi to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

data.prayer: Father, thank you that you will never abandon the church of Rumphi, Malawi.
data.verse: Be free from the love of money, content with such things as you have, for he has said, “I will in no way leave you, neither will I in any way forsake you.

data.section_summary:
the state of Rumphi, Malawi has a population of 1,389,000.

We estimate Rumphi has 236,270 people who might know Jesus, 814,971 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 337,759 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 5 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, teach your Word to the people of the the state of Rumphi, so that they can follow your ways all their life.
data.verse: Teach me, Lord, the way of your decrees, that I may follow it to the end.
